snippet: Beginning July 2, American will operate 10 flights a week instead of the current 48, and only fly from Miami.
abstract: American Airlines says it will cut nearly 80 percent of its flights to Venezuela in dispute over revenue being held by the South American country.
lead_paragraph: Beginning July 2, American will operate 10 flights a week instead of the current 48, and only fly from Miami.

headline.main: American Airlines Cuts Most Venezuela Flights
headline.print_headline: American Airlines Cuts Most Venezuela Flights
